Why Choose Heaton Moor Golf Club?

Over 130 years of tradition, championship golf, and exceptional hospitality in the heart of Greater Manchester.

üèÜ

Championship Golf

Play our challenging par 70, 6,000 yards parkland course set in a beautiful conservation area. Two 9-hole loops provide variety and test every aspect of your game.

üë•

Member-Owned Excellence

As a member-owned club, we're committed to providing exceptional value and service. Join our community and enjoy unlimited access, competitions, and social events.

üè†

Outstanding Facilities

Modern clubhouse with dining facilities, professional shop, practice areas, and function room for events. Everything you need for the perfect golf experience.

A Legacy of Excellence Since 1892

For over 133 years, Heaton Moor Golf Club has been a cornerstone of Greater Manchester's golfing community. Our member-owned club combines rich tradition with modern excellence, offering an unparalleled golfing experience in our beautiful parkland setting.

As proud members of the prestigious 1892 Club network, we maintain the highest standards of golf and hospitality while preserving the timeless values that have made us a beloved institution.

About the Club

Established in 1892, Heaton Moor Golf Club is a member-owned club offering championship golf in a beautiful parkland setting.
